dublin_core.dcvalue: Local health workers seek urgent support from Heartfile clearing house to provide poor with cash transfers to avoid medical improverishment
Heartfile Health Financing – an mHealth enabled innovation in health social protection
Doctor/provider, Clinic, Facility-based health worker, Hospital, None
Dr. Sania Nishtar, Founder, Heartfile, Tel: +92-51-8358968, Email: sania@heartfile.org

World Economic Forum’s International Partnership for Innovative Healthcare Delivery (IPIHD), Clinton Global Initiative, mHealth Alliance of the UN Foundation, Rockefeller Foundation, Canada’s International Development Research Centre (IDRC), Pakistan Poverty Alleviation Fund
Heartfile Health Financing – an mHealth enabled innovation in health social protection

Financial transactions and incentives, Data collection and reporting, Child health, Family planning, HIV/AIDS, Infectious diseases, Malaria and other vector-borne diseases, Maternal health, Newborn health, Non-communicable diseases, Nutrition, Parasitic diseases, Primary Care, Sexual and reproductive health, Tuberculosis, Violence, Water, sanitation, and hygiene
